alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 16 at 3:01AM HST until February 16 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU AND KAUAI UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI AND OAHU UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... .Medium-period northeast swell generated by the kona low passing north of the islands is larger than expected, and will produce high surf on Oahu and Kauai County today. As the low is now moving away from the area, the swell is expected to diminish rapidly later this afternoon. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf of 12 to 16 feet. * WHERE...North facing shores of Niihau and Kauai. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
